SCRIPT.MSCRI:
! Buidling Connect command : SET &UC4RB_VMM_CONNECT_CMDLET# = "Get-SCVMMServer "
! Server IP or URL : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SCVMM.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &TEMP_OPTION_VALUE# = &UC4RB_VMM_SERVER_IP# : SET &UC4RB_VMM_CONNECT_CMDLET# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_VMM_CONNECT_CMDLET#, "-ComputerName '&UC4RB_VMM_ESC_VALUE#' ")
! Port : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SCVMM.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &TEMP_OPTION_VALUE# = &UC4RB_VMM_PORT# : SET &UC4RB_VMM_CONNECT_CMDLET# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_VMM_CONNECT_CMDLET#, "-TCPPort '&UC4RB_VMM_ESC_VALUE#' ")
! Username : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SCVMM.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &TEMP_OPTION_VALUE# = &UC4RB_VMM_USERNAME# : SET &UC4RB_VMM_ESC_USER# = &UC4RB_VMM_ESC_VALUE#
